Source.Name: lsfg-vk
Source.Summary: Lossless Scaling Frame Generation on Linux via DXVK/Vulkan
Source.Description: Lossless Scaling is a Windows-exclusive app with the goal of bringing frame generation (among other features) to every single game or app. lsfg-vk brings this frame generation to Linux users by acting as a Vulkan layer inbetween your game and your graphics card.
